refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates a summary of all the regions in the specified list of objects. The summary is written in the specified output_file.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Creates a summary of all the regions in the specified list of objects. The summary is written in the specified output_file. The summary includes, for each region, a sequential region number, its ident, air code, material code, los, the path from one of the objects to the region, and the Boolean formula for the region.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the regions command to create a summary of the regions that are in the specified objects. The summary is written in a specified file.

example.title: Create a summary of regions contained in specified objects.
example.para: Places a summary of all the regions from group1 and group2 in the file named regions_file.
